title: Profile Picture on Boards profile bugged
body:
You know how when you change your summoner icon in game and it changes on the boards profile aswell when you log in? Yea that isn't happening for me for some reason and I don't know why. I have the C9 Summ icon on the client but it's not here on the boards.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sometimes it takes a while for the boards to update based on what you've selected in-game.

The steps I personally take that seem to update it more often than not are to

**Select summoner icon in client** > **Logout of client** > **Logout of boards** > **Log back into boards**

If that doesn't work you'll just have to wait it out.
I've tried what you said about three times and I have just waited it out for about 11 days yet it still hasn't changed. BibleThump {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
That's odd, you might try [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to have your boards profile updated.
